metadata.title: CVE-2025-1009 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have caused a use-after-free via crafted XSLT data,leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 135, Firefox ESR < 115.20, Firefox ESR < 128.7, Thunderbird <128.7, and Thunderbird < 135.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
